import React from "react"; const PatientsViewModal = ({ show, onClose, patient }) => { if (!show) return null; if (!patient) return null; // Ensure patient data exists return (

Profile

{patient.name}

Age:

{patient.age} years old

Date:

{patient.createdAt}

Gender:

{patient.gender}

Address:

{patient.location}

Mobile No:

{patient.phone}

); }; export default PatientsViewModal;
